David is a clinical doctoral student interested in the cognitive and neural mechanisms underlying risk-taking behavior in hypomania. His project focuses on the potential moderating roles of reward focus and risk perception.

*David Minchella (Dclin, 2026): Does reward focus moderate the relationship between hypomania and economic risk-taking?*
